description: Number of divisors of (n!)!, or A000197.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,7
maple: with(numtheory): A062008:=n->tau((n!)!): seq(A062008(n), n=0..6); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 08 2014
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,6,print(numdiv(n!!)))(PARI) { for (n=0, 7, write("b062008.txt", n, " ", numdiv(n!!)) ) } \\ [_Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009](MAGMA) [NumberOfDivisors(Factorial(Factorial(n))): n in [0..7]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 09 2014
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 04 2001
